name: Everyone Dice
description:
Disclaimer: We are sorry that the menu UI is offset. It's just a visual bug.

Shoot 20d12s from your d20 at d8s that are shooting at you with d4s. Or shoot 4d8s from your d4 at d12s. YOU DECIDE.

In Everyone Dice, everyone and everything is a die and your battlefield is determined by dice rolls. Your and your enemy's HP, size, appearance, speed, damage and other stats are set at the start of each run. Survive through an endless horde of randomly generated dice enemies until you get bored because there is no end to this hell.
